name: Cats in Flats
description:
The web build is the post jam version,  for the original download the file below!

Play in full screen for the full experience!

In this 3D top-down shooter, you fight off hoards of cats in order to save your pet Goldfish! The cats may start by looking cute and innocent but soon, they ramp up their attack to a military standard! Guns, Tanks and Choppers will be sent after you, and most importantly your fish...

To win you must survive all 15 waves, including the final boss battle, and also have your fish survive along with you! You can create defences using what furniture is available, and purchase items, weapons and upgrades from the shop!

All assets were made during the 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46, some disclaimers are made in the credits menu!

Thanks for Playing!

There is an in game tutorial as well as tips along the way however if you get stuck:

WASD- Move

LMB- Shoot

-Press E while looking at furniture to pick it up and E again to throw

-Press E while looking at the TV to access the shop and E to close it again

-Right mouse button is use item
